content: अपनुत्तिः {%<ab>f.</ab>%} नोदः --नोदनं Removing, taking away, removal, destroying, driving away; expiation, atonement (as of a sin); पापानामपनुत्तये <ls>Ms. 11. 210</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 11.">140</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 11.">93</ls>; <ls>Y. 3. 306</ls>; गुरुतल्प° <ls>Ms. 11. 107</ls>; ब्रह्महत्यापनोदाय <ls n="Ms.">11. 76</ls>; कृच्छ्रोयं सर्वपापापनोदनः <ls n="Ms.">11. 216</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 11.">253</ls>, <ls n="Ms. 11.">261.</ls>
